name: T - Aurora Nicole
_source: speak;Aurora; You, young woman!{w} I sense unease in your soul!
speak;Aurora; Yes, yes, something troubles you{tgm}...{tgm} Something deep, dark, and personal{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; Are ya readin' my mind?!
speak;Aurora; I can feel it in your spirit, young one. Your body and mind are misaligned.{w} You're unsure{tgm}...
speak;Aurora; About a young man, perhaps?
speak;Nicole; Oh, well{tgm}...{tgm} I am a little nervous 'bout my relationship with Carson{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I don't know if my little sweetheart is ready to know how much I hurt inside{tgm}...
speak;Aurora; Ah yes, the lover's pain. A deep secret that you can't tell him.{w} For, what would he think of you if he knew the whole truth?{w} Am I right?
speak;Nicole; I'm ashamed for havin' things I haven't told him, but I dunno how to say it!{w} I ain't good with confrontin' people and sayin' the right words{tgm}...
speak;Aurora; Of course, I'd be happy to help you and do some mystic readings.{w} They could give you the guidance that you need to talk to him.

speak;Nicole; You would do that{tgm}...{tgm}? You'd ask them smart spirits questions on how to help little old me?{w} Oh, honey, you're as pure as a pegasus feather for helping out of the kindness of your heart!
speak;Aurora; Ha! Oh honey, of course I charge for it.{w} Something like that{tgm}...{tgm} I think 90 gold will do?{w} I assure you that for life changing advice, it's quite a deal.
speak;Nicole; O-Oh, I ain't got any coin in my purse right now{tgm}...
speak;Aurora; Mmm, a shame.{w} I'm sure I could've done a reading and solved your little problem.{w} Oh well.
speak;Nicole; W-wait, I'm sure I can find a coin!
